header.name: ConceptWaveMetadata
header.author: Claire Carbone
header.description:
4.27.0 # Support for GRAN-yyyy: "Cancel Order" Functionality in EOC EBU UI from Granite - STCSUP-1431

4.27.1 # Propagating workaround implemented for Null value for NV Pair "FeasibilityStatus" - STCSUP-1585

4.27.2 # Enhancing function to support:

- order open in EOC and in Granite -> function should generate the cancel order and propagate it to Granite

- order open in EOC and cancelled in Granite -> function should Cancel the order in EOC only

- order open in EOC and SIP completed in Granite while service is still pending ->

if orderType = I, function should generate the cancel order and propagate it to Granite

if orderType = C or T, function should only cancel the service

- order open in EOC and SIP circuit and services are completed in Granite -> ERROR

4.27.3 # Fix for STCSUP-1657

4.27.4/4.27.5 # Fix for STCSUP-1664

4.27.5.1 # STCSUP-1861 - Enhancement in SIU management

4.27.6 # Fix for STCSUP-1724 but without STCSUP-1861

4.27.7 # Fix for STCSUP-1724 + STCSUP-1861

4.27.8 # CR-22586

From 4.26.16 - R0 + STCSUP-1455 + STCSUP-1585 + Fix for STCSUP-1724 + STCSUP-1861 + CR-22586
header.label: STC Order Management EBU
